name: 2020 the game (Mr_Aporia)
description:
2020 the Game
An extremely small game made for the 2020 AD GameJam. You get to explore the incredibly bright setting of early 2020 to just be thrown into late 2020 with it being dark and dreary; Remember to avoid the virus for your meeting it is fatal but it is yet another obstacle we as humans must over come as your character does in this game.
